abstract.t: The Sieve Email Filtering Language consists of action commands that can reply to the sender of an incoming message with a generated message. This document defines an extension to such commands to allow a copy of the generated reply message to be filed into a target mailbox.Open Issues o Should :fcc be allowed with reject/ereject? o Should there be a separate capability string for each action that uses :fcc (e.g. "vacation-fcc")?
